      • isCircleGestureClockwiseDirection

        public static boolean isCircleGestureClockwiseDirection(com.leapmotion.leap.CircleGesture _circle)
        Returns if the CircleGesture direction is clockwise or counterclockwise.
        Computes the rotation direction (clockwise or counterclockwise) using the angle between circle normal vector and the pointable(finger performing the circle gesture) vector.
        If the angle between these two vectors is <= Pi/4 --> clockwise
        Else --> counterclockwise
        Parameters:
        _circle -
        Returns:
        true = clockwise direction, false = counterclockwise direction

        Returns:
        isDigit
